pages.text: When the sponsorship accumulates to 88.88 RMB, you become an Advanced Sponsor of the modpack. $(br2)Advanced Sponsors can customize one or more special items exclusively for sponsors within a reasonable range, and you can include these items as a side content of the modpack. $(br2)When entering the game, a blue welcome message will be displayed, which can also be seen by other players in the current dimension.
When sending messages in chat, the brackets next to your name will have a special color, just like this: $(br2)$(3)<$()Name$(3)>$() Message
